welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fontenay-le-Fleury! Known for its charming streets, historical landmarks, and beautiful parks, we invite you to discover the beauty and culture of our city. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal Sud
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Ouest
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals and serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited to certain areas or time limits.
